level.text: A custodial trustee, acting in a fiduciary capacity, has all the rights and powers over custodial trust property which an unmarried adult owner has over individually owned property, but a custodial trustee may exercise those rights and powers in a fiduciary capacity only.
This section does not relieve a custodial trustee from liability for a violation of section 19-1107.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 19-1106.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-177
level.text: For Law 14-177, see notes following ยง 19-1101.
